effect.Name: Screen
effect.description: Screen - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at each channels color information and multiplies the inverse of the blend and base colors. The result color is always a lighter color. Screening with black leaves the color unchanged. Screening with white produces white. The effect is similar to projecting multiple photographic slides on top of each other
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Screen (Background) Shader | 1.1 (24.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at each channels color information and multiplies the inverse of the blend and base colors. The result color is always a lighter color. Screening with black leaves the color unchanged. Screening with white produces white. The effect is similar to projecting multiple photographic slides on top of each other

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
